data.oai_dc:dc: Data for Intertemporal Similarity: Discounting as a Last Resort

These data were collected in three experiments in which human participants were asked to make binary intertemporal choices, staircase intertemporal choices, and similarity judgments for reward amounts and time delays. Experiment 1 used real rewards and delays and was conducted in Berlin, Germany. Experiments 2 and 3 used hypothetical rewards and delays and were conducted in Lincoln, Nebraska.
